DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll large population approximately 252467 participant . The study would analyze association cancer pioglitazone 2 cohort base usage pioglitazone . Participants originally plan followed-up January 1 , 1997 December 31 , 2005 . Based discussion advisory board , recommend increase study population duration follow-up . The follow-up period extend June 30 , 2012 study . This multi-center trial conduct United States America . The overall time participate study approximately 15.5 year . Participants followed-up January 1 , 1997 June 30 , 2012 assessment cancer risk associate pioglitazone use .
